review: Extremely easy setup.  No need for a smart tv with this device.  I broadcast Netflix and anything from Google Chrome from my cell phone, laptop, and AIO computer.  If you're contemplating this as an alternative to a wireless or wired connection, this is definitely the one!
author: Evaristo

review: Meet my expectation. I like the product.
author: Wiola

review: for google users, these are the best deal ever - might get one for each TV in the house
author: Eric Rakes

review: It's nice too see videos on my 40" LCD instead of my 20" monitor.
author: Amazon Customer

review: It's a bit of a pain to use this. I didn't like having to depend on my computer to watch anything. It's also very slow and lost connection quite a bit. We accidentally broke it after a few months, but it wasn't much of a loss.
author: db4kb

review: Does what it says it will do.
author: Dennis Harlan

review: No physical remote, better buy Amazon Fire or nexus tv
author: Ethan
